Uses of Package
Hexxagon.View

  • Packages that use Hexxagon.View 
    Package Description
    Hexxagon.Controller
    Classes and interfaces found in this package are designed to implement the controller layer of Hexxagon module.
    Hexxagon.View
    Classes and interfaces found in this package are designed to implement the view layer of Hexxagon module.
    Window
    Classes and interfaces found in this package are designed to implement the pages and main functionalities of the application.
  • Classes in Hexxagon.View used by Hexxagon.Controller 
    Class and Description
    IFaceBoard
    Contains method specifications of face view component of game.
    IInfoBoard
    Contains method specifications of info view component of game.
    IPlayBoard
    Contains method specifications of board view component of game.
    IPlayBoard.FinishCodeEnum
    Contains different reasons why the game was finished.
  • Classes in Hexxagon.View used by Hexxagon.View 
    Class and Description
    IFaceBoard
    Contains method specifications of face view component of game.
    IInfoBoard
    Contains method specifications of info view component of game.
    InfoBoard.PlayerRow
    Visual row class.
    IPlayBoard
    Contains method specifications of board view component of game.
    IPlayBoard.FinishCodeEnum
    Contains different reasons why the game was finished.
    PlayBoard
    Instance of this class realises a virtual game board as a JavaFX specific graphical node.
    PlayBoard.BoardPit
    Instances of this class implements a graphical component on board.
    PlayBoard.Coordinate
    Instances of this class represents coordinates storing x and y values.
  • Classes in Hexxagon.View used by Window 
    Class and Description
    IFaceBoard
    Contains method specifications of face view component of game.
    IInfoBoard
    Contains method specifications of info view component of game.
    IPlayBoard
    Contains method specifications of board view component of game.
